title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Assisted Self-Regulated English Learning: Microlearning Course for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and comprehension of job-related mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Enhanced English learning strategies for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to apply in real workplace contexts

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-regulated learning plans at least three times per week through gamification activities on mobile apps
Learners can produce job-related scenarios in English using digital storytelling tools and improve speaking/writing fluency by 20%
Learners provide and receive feedback on peers' English presentation content at least twice weekly through a peer coaching system
Learners achieve Level 3+ (on a 5-level scale) in explaining mathematical terminology and problem-solving processes in English, based on rubric criteria through microlearning modules
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
